WRITING.TEXT: I know but it's not that realistic. Historically the borders changed after the war ended. Thanks for suggestion though.

WRITING.TITLE: Wouldn't it be cool if you could trade tiles as part of a peace deal?
WRITING.TEXT: Every tile has a cost already, so why it's not possible to trade it on a peace deal screen? Is there a mod for Civ V or VI that provides such feature?
Just watch one of Marbozir's LP on Civ 5 and you will know most of such tricks.

...Firaxis-quality modded civs...
Soooo, are the leader models animated as Firaxis ones? ;)
Thanks for a recommendation. I already used it on my Android Phone and its great. I forgot that there is a Linux version as well.
